title: Performance Package
content: The Performance Package consisting of performance brakes and lights as well as a suspension seatpost offers you even more riding pleasure. The Tektro TRP C 2.3 cargo brake can withstand extreme constant loads and provides great stability and reduced wear. The Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight offers the best lighting conditions, while the Supernova M99 Tail Light with brake light ensures maximum safety. The suspension seatpost absorbs vibrations and shocks and helps ensure a comfortable ride

warnings: Format mismatch: Missing card-info container, Missing "More Information" button
